Command Line Interface¶

scales-nlp configure¶

Update configuration keys.

scales-nlp configure [OPTIONS] [GROUP]

Options

--reset, --no-reset¶

Delete existing group keys in config

Arguments

GROUP¶

Optional argument

scales-nlp download¶

Download a case from PACER. This will bill your PACER account.

Provide the UCID of the case. The ucid consists of {court};;{docket_number}

Example UCID: ilnd;;1:21-cv-04600

scales-nlp download [OPTIONS] UCID

Arguments

UCID¶

Required argument

scales-nlp parse¶

Parse downloaded PACER data in the PACER_DIR into JSON format. Leave court blank to parse all courts.

scales-nlp parse [OPTIONS] [COURT]

Arguments

COURT¶

Optional argument

scales-nlp train¶

Run a training routine from a csv file.

Specify one of the following tasks:

classification

multi-label-classification

token-classification (ner)

scales-nlp train [OPTIONS] DATA_PATH OUTPUT_DIR TASK

Options

--model-name <model_name>¶

Name of model to finetune

--loss <loss>¶

Name of loss to use for training

--metric <metric>¶

Name of metric to use for evaluation

--max-length <max_length>¶

Truncate inputs to max token sequence length

--eval-split <eval_split>¶

Proportion of data to use for evaluation

--epochs <epochs>¶

Number of training epochs

--train-batch-size <train_batch_size>¶

Train batch size

--eval-batch-size <eval_batch_size>¶

Evaluation batch size

--gradient-accumulation-steps <gradient_accumulation_steps>¶

Artificially increase the train batch size

--learning-rate <learning_rate>¶

Learning rate

--warmup-ratio <warmup_ratio>¶

Learning rate warmup

--weight-decay <weight_decay>¶

Weight decay for AdamW

--save-steps <save_steps>¶

Save model checkpoint every n steps

--push <push>¶

model id to push to hub

--overwrite, --no-overwrite¶

Overwrite output dir if it exists

--multi-label-delimiter <multi_label_delimiter>¶

Delimiter for splitting labels in multi-label-classification task

--text-col <text_col>¶

The column with text

--label-col <label_col>¶

The column with labels

Arguments

DATA_PATH¶

Required argument

OUTPUT_DIR¶

Required argument

TASK¶

Required argument
